name: Pixel Funland
description:
Welcome to the pixel world, defeat enemies to get equiment, re-experience childhood fun!

[Map]

Monsters appear across the map, defeat them to get epic rewards!


[Fun Gameplay]

Check out our different kinds of events!


[Monster Follow]

Defeat monsters have chance to bring them home to cultivate!


[World BOSS]

World BOSS appears in night-time, gather up and challenge him!


[Ladder]

Go for No.1 Seat in Ladder!
